article_title: Former First Reserve Managing Director Plans New Fund
article_text:
There’s a new-ish player in private equity’s energy patch.

Former First Reserve Managing Director Mark McComiskey has launched a new fund to invest in oil and gas companies, according to several people familiar with Mr. McComiskey’s plans.

twitter.description: Former First Reserve Corp. Managing Director Mark McComiskey is returning to energy investing with plans to raise a new fund.
twitter.title: Former First Reserve Managing Director Plans New Fund
